about_the_game:
Singularity Shooter

Singularity Shooter is an arcade with realistic gravity physics of black holes, where your task is to avoid meteors and collect as many points as possible.You are able to play in three different difficulties .Heart of the game is shooting black holes that can destroy or change the direction of the meteors, but there are other interesting bonuses that can protect you from fast meteors, like canons or shields.

Bonuses:

Star - gives you score
Pack of bullets - shoots 50 bullets around you
Red canon - Canon with low reload time, but lasts just for 15 seconds
Blue canon - Canon with higher reload time, but lasts till some meteor hits him
Shield - Creates shield around you that protects you from meteors

name: Singularity Shooter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: any
  • Memory: 500 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or higher
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GT 640 or higher
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

short_description: Singularity Shooter is an arcade with realistic gravity physics of black holes, where your task is to avoid meteors and collect as many points as possible. Lots of bonuses can help you in your space adventure.
